title: Critter Shampoo
summaries: Critter Shampoo is a vanity accessory equipped in a social accessory slot that changes the color of summoned minions when paired with a dye in the corresponding dye slot. It is purchased from the Zoologist for 10 after completing at least 30% (157 entries) of the Bestiary.

statistics.Buy: 10
statistics.Sell: 2
